column2: :  පුතා මිය ගිය අව ්ථාව ගවනගකොට පුතා ගකොගෙේද හිටිගේ?
:  දැන් ඔය සිද්ධිය ගවනගකොට කවුරු කවුරුද ගෙදර සිටිගේ?

Vide page 181 of the appeal brief is as: Vide page 198 of the appeal brief is as follows;

column2: :  ඒ අව ්ථාගව් ක ඉග ඩ් ගකොගෙේද හිටිගේ?

Vide page 181 of the appeal brief is as: PW 2 stated that the deceased was not at home when the accused-appellant calls his name.
Vide page 371 of the appeal brief is as follows;
PW 2 stated that deceased came from Daru’s shop but not from house.
Vide page 372 of the appeal brief is as follows;

column2: :  සුනිල් ඉග ඩ් ඉග ඩ් කියලා කතා ගකරුවා ඊට ප ්ග ේ ඉග ඩ් ආවා.

Vide page 181 of the appeal brief is as: PW 1 stated that there was no conversation between the accused and the deceased.
But PW 2 says there was a conversation between them.
Vide page 374 of the appeal brief is as follows;

column2: :  දැන් සුනිල්  ෙ ඔබ ගේ ආකාරගයන් බලා ගෙන ඉන්නගකොට ඉග ඩ්  ෙ සුනිල් අතර
:  සුනිල් ඇහුවා උඹ අගේ මල්ලිට ෙැහුවාද කියලා.

Vide page 181 of the appeal brief is as: PW 1 said that the accused-appellant was using a different path to go to his house.
PW 2 states that the accused-appellant had to pass his house to go to his home.
